content.thinking: Let me analyze this identification document and extract the information according to the required schema. First, I need to determine what kind of document this is and verify it's an official government ID. This appears to be a "Cédula de Ciudadanía" from Colombia, which is a Colombian national ID card. I can see the header "REPÚBLICA DE COLOMBIA IDENTIFICACIÓN PERSONAL CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA" clearly indicating it's an official government ID from Colombia. Now I'll extract all required fields systematically: **firstName**: I see "NOMBRES: LUIS ALBERTO" on the document. So the first name is "LUIS ALBERTO". **lastName**: I see "APELLIDOS: VARGAS VELOZA" on the document. So the last name is "VARGAS VELOZA". **country_issuer**: The document header clearly states "REPÚBLICA DE COLOMBIA", so the issuing country is "Colombia". **nationality**: There is no explicit nationality field visible, but since this is a Colombian "Cédula de Ciudadanía" which is typically issued to Colombian citizens, and seeing the birth place is "UBATE (CUNDINAMARCA)" which is in Colombia, we can assume the nationality is "Colombia". **identificationType**: The document clearly states "CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA" which translates directly to "Cédula de Ciudadanía" in the required Spanish format. **identificationNumber**: I see "NÚMERO: 19.067.068" on the document. So the identification number is "19.067.068". **Additional information visible**: - Birth date: "FECHA DE NACIMIENTO: 22-ABR-1949" - Birth place: "UBATE (CUNDINAMARCA)" - indicating the person was born in Ubate, Cundinamarca, Colombia - Height: "ESTATURA: 1.65" - Blood type: "G.S. RH: A+" - Sex: "SEXO: M" (Male) - Date and place of issuance: "FECHA Y LUGAR DE EXPEDICIÓN: 26-MAY-1970 BOGOTA D.C." Now that I've extracted all the required information, I'll format it according to the schema: ```json { "result": { "firstName": "LUIS ALBERTO", "lastName": "VARGAS VELOZA", "country_issuer": "Colombia", "nationality": "Colombia", "identificationType": "Cédula de Ciudadanía", "identificationNumber": "19.067.068", "message": "" }, "document_type": "person", "category": "CECRL" } ``` This appears to be a complete and valid extraction of the information from this Colombian ID card, following all the requirements in the schema. All fields have been properly identified and populated.
